title: WTB: Detroit Tiger Broadleaf, Lenox, Drum or Uzit
author: baztacula

posts.post_title: WTB: Detroit Tiger Broadleaf, Lenox, Drum or Uzit
posts.post_content: Anyone have a Tiger that they are willing to sell with any of those backs? SGC preferred.
I think that there is a Cobb/ Lenox that might be available.

[quote name="Sean" post=1588127]I think that there is a Cobb/ Lenox that might be available.[/QUOTE]

Oh boy :p

Any Cobb with a rare back will probably be out of my price range... so unless someone wants to sell me one cheaply, solely for the pleasure of the experience, I'm thinking Cobb should be crossed off the list.

Anyone selling in 2017?

Also, if someone has a Red Cross (type 1) of a Detroit Tigers player, I'm interested.
